sentence.Network_en: Their host plants were chiefly Cerastium oruense , Veronica didyma, Aster americana, Humulus candens and so on.
sentence.Network_cn: 春季, 叶螨多集中在菜地田埂及公路边等环境稳定的场所活动,寄主主要有卷耳,婆婆纳, 美洲紫菀和?草等.

植物学专业词汇港台... ... 寄奴花 （Y.M） 寄奴花属（石竹科） Cerastium;mouse-ear chickweed 寄生鳞叶草 Epirixanthus elongata Bl.

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, from Greek kerastēs 'horned' (with reference to the shape of many seed capsules) + -ium
